comment.caption: Men and women on a hay-filled wagon at Grandview farm
comment.note: One of a series of photos from Mary Jane Truman's Christmas Album, 1906. Blurred picture of a group of men and women on a hay-filled wagon at the Grandview farm. Caption says "A Real Hayride." From: Copied from photos lent to the Truman Library by Martha Ann Swoyer, daughter of Vivian Truman.
